TextLibrary.Text: KIRINE
This place is huge, but I don't see any sign of the Soulless. Find anything?
This place is huge, but I don't see any sign of the Soulless. Find anything?
Not what I'm looking for.
Not what I'm looking for.
What are you looking for? Maybe I can help.
What are you looking for? Maybe I can help.
Wait...
Wait...
If the Soulless aren't here then we must have been wrong back in Pleione.
If the Soulless aren't here then we must have been wrong back in Pleione.
I'm not even sure what we're looking for here. Kirine seemed to think there was something interesting though. Maybe I should...
I'm not even sure what we're looking for here. Kirine seemed to think there was something interesting though. Maybe I should...
Hey! Wait! Who are you? You look like... Kirine? Is that you?
Hey! Wait! Who are you? You look like... Kirine? Is that you?
Kirine is not my name.
Kirine is not my name.
Who or what are you?
Who or what are you?
Call me Beta Prime.
Call me Beta Prime.
I... I thought... thought you'd be a man.
I... I thought... thought you'd be a man.
How very HUMAN of you.
How very HUMAN of you.
And before you reach for your weapons, I mean you no harm. I am not like my children.
And before you reach for your weapons, I mean you no harm. I am not like my children.
Then they are all clones of YOU?
Then they are all clones of YOU?
Some of them are direct clones, some are many times removed. I promise you though, I will help put them down. They are a disease.
Some of them are direct clones, some are many times removed. I promise you though, I will help put them down. They are a disease.
